name: Legends of Eugor
description:
Legends of Eugor

You died deep in a dungeon. Now you need to figure out your whole journey. Let your life rewind in front of your eyes! Revive the enemies, gain back your health and find the entrance to dungeon!

Credits: Vojtěch Košař, Ondřej Martínek, Karolína Žáková, Michal Žák

Our participation to GGJ 2021 https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/legends-eugor-6

Follow us on Twitter or join our Discord Server. Play our game 11th Dream! :)
